div.class: post-173 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-dining category-events category-uncategorized tag-addison tag-dallas tag-dallas-suburbs tag-food tag-nick-sams-grill tag-redevelopement tag-theater

a.title: Permalink to Get Ready North Dallas – Coal Vines / Nick & Sam’s Grill Opening Addison

h2.a: Get Ready North Dallas – Coal Vines / Nick & Sam’s Grill Opening Addison

div.p: Get ready North Dallas, this restaurant movie theater combo will soon be the next north Dallas hotspot. Coming soon at the NE corner of Belt Line Rd at Prestonwood Blvd just East of Addison’s famous restaurant row is a future area favorite. This theater promises 11 screens and the fine dining aforementioned. Right now they are in tear-down mode. The attached eye care business will remain – many Addison area businesses are watching this development closely. Personally , I welcome any positive redevelopment in area. What do you think?

a.title: Click to email this to a friend

div.span: Tagged Addison, Dallas, Dallas Suburbs, Food, Nick & Sam's Grill, Redevelopement, Theater

a.title: Comment on Get Ready North Dallas – Coal Vines / Nick & Sam’s Grill Opening Addison

div.class: post-169 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-dining category-uncategorized tag-breakfast tag-dallas tag-east-dallas tag-food tag-good-2-go-taco tag-lunch tag-tacos tag-white-rock

a.title: Permalink to Good 2 Go Taco – East Dallas by White Rock

h2.a: Good 2 Go Taco – East Dallas by White Rock

div.p: Get your taco on at Good 2 Go Taco. According to local legend, Rusty B -try the “hash over” and you won’t be disappointed. Open for breakfast and lunch only… So head next door to Goodfriend for the best burger around if you are seeking dinner.

a.title: Permalink to Apple Store Dallas has Reopened @ Knox / McKinney

h2.a: Apple Store Dallas has Reopened @ Knox / McKinney

div.p: Grand reopening of the apple store in the Knox Henderson area of Dallas. This store resembles the modern design seen on 5th Ave in NYC. Come in and enjoy the Apple experience… Just be patient while parking!

div.class: post-158 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-dining category-events tag-addison tag-bars tag-dallas tag-dallas-suburbs tag-oklahoma-university tag-red-river-rivalry tag-shuffleboard tag-texasou-weekend tag-university-of-texas

a.title: Permalink to Pokes Addison – Texas OU Weekend

div.p: Pokes Bar in Addison is hosting a killer Texas OU weekend bash. The Erica Perry band is rocking the house!! Regardless of who you are for in the big game we are having a great time! Addison drink specials! Addison food specials! Hey guys – get to Pokes Addison and give them a try… If you are at Dukes Addison or Sherlocks Addison try a new place and you won’t be disappointed. Remember that Pokes Addison has a FULL SIZE shuffleboard table – remember I want to start a Addison shuffleboard tournament series so ask the bartender to sign up.

a.title: Click to email this to a friend

div.span: Tagged Addison, Bars, Dallas, Dallas Suburbs, Oklahoma University, Red River Rivalry, Shuffleboard, Texas/OU Weekend, University of Texas

a.title: Comment on Pokes Addison – Texas OU Weekend

div.class: post-154 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-dining tag-addison tag-asian-fusion-food tag-belt-line-rd tag-dallas tag-dallas-farmers-market tag-dallas-suburbs tag-food tag-yumi-to-go

a.title: Permalink to Yumi to Go – Addison’s newest Asian Fusion Concept

h2.a: Yumi to Go – Addison’s newest Asian Fusion Concept

div.p: Yumi to Go is Addison’s newest Asian fusion concept. If you are dining in you will immediately be welcomed by warm, bright colors. The menu is clearly laid out on the wall with large, easy to read captions supported by pictures. Yumi to Go’s menu is built around freshness… Produce is local from the Dallas farmers market – delivered 6 days a week! Nothing is pre-battered and all salad dressings are mixed fresh in house. Any questions, ask for the general manager, Tony. Visit www.yumitogo.com to order online or just stop in – you won’t be disappointed! Located at 5000 Belt Line Road, Suite 400 in Addison next to Freebirds (SW Corner Belt Line @ Tollway). Call 972-239-YUMI with any questions or to place an order today!

a.title: Click to email this to a friend

div.span: Tagged Addison, Asian Fusion Food, Belt Line Rd., Dallas, Dallas Farmer's Market, Dallas Suburbs, Food, Yumi To Go

a.title: Comment on Yumi to Go – Addison’s newest Asian Fusion Concept

div.class: post-143 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-dining category-nightlife tag-addison tag-bars tag-beer tag-bloody-marys tag-dallas tag-dallas-suburbs tag-pokes-bar-grill tag-sports

a.title: Permalink to Pokes Bar & Grill – Addison

div.p:
Pokes Bar & Grill may be my new favorite bar in Addison. A big space with shuffleboard, billiards, golden tee and more games suits Mr Addison well. Cheap beer, TV’s everywhere encapsulate the place… The staff is A+
in my book to boot! Get here for Sunday brunch… the bloody mary’s make the weekend last longer…

a.title: Click to email this to a friend

div.span: Tagged Addison, Bars, Beer, Bloody Mary's, Dallas, Dallas Suburbs, Pokes Bar & Grill, Sports

a.title: Comment on Pokes Bar & Grill – Addison

div.class: post-139 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-events tag-dallas tag-dallas-love-field tag-southwest-airlines

a.title: Permalink to Southwest Airlines “Mock Flight” @ Dallas Love

div.p: I was invited to participate in a mock flight on southwest airlines this afternoon. We boarded the simulator named “Poolie” I’m told named after Sandy Pool – the original training instructor at SWA – they are very sentimental and celebrate good people around here as evidenced all over the hallways. The simulation was clearly looking to get feedback on new seating southwest is considering on offering on future flights – more comfortable, yes. This was my first visit to Southwest HQ and it’s very colorful place – I feel as if I better understand the famous Southwest corporate culture now that I studied in business school. We are about to begin our decent and it’s getting bumpy so I better go!

a.title: Click to email this to a friend

div.span: Tagged Dallas, Dallas Love Field, Southwest Airlines

a.title: Comment on Southwest Airlines “Mock Flight” @ Dallas Love
